home.aboutText: Student as a web integrator at OpenClassrooms, I aim to deepen my knowledge.
home.contactText: Any questions, or a project in mind?

about.title: About
about.description: I am a developer passionate about building modern and high-performance web applications.
about.descriptionExtended:
Web integration student at OpenClassrooms, I aim to create more projects, especially personal ones, in order to make the most of my learning and further develop my skills.

Currently, my preferred tools are React and Tailwind CSS, which I use to build modern, responsive, and performant user interfaces.

I do not intend to stop at front-end development and plan to learn back-end technologies as well, with the goal of becoming a full-stack developer.

courses.title: Courses & Experience
courses.trainingIntro: Here's an overview of my academic and professional journey.
